sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './newpermit.css'; const businessTypes = [ 'COOPERATIVE', 'CORPORATION', 'ONE PERSON CORPORATION', 'PARTNERSHIP', 'SOLE PROPRIETORSHIP', ]; const regions = ['NCR', 'Region I', 'Region II']; // Placeholder const provinces = ['Metro Manila', 'Ilocos Norte']; // Placeholder const cities = ['Quezon City', 'Laoag City']; // Placeholder const barangays = ['Barangay 1', 'Barangay 2']; // Placeholder const officeTypes = [ 'Main Office', 'Branch Office', 'Admin Office Only', 'Warehouse', 'Others', ]; const requirementsList = [ 'Proof of Registration (DTI, SEC, CDA, etc.)', 'Proof of right to use location (Tax Declaration, Lease/MOA, or consent)', 'Location Plan or sketch', 'Barangay Clearance', 'Market Clearance (if stallholder)', 'Photocopy of Occupancy Permit (if newly constructed building)', 'Community Tax Certificate (CEDULA)', 'Actual Photo of Business Establishment (Interior)', 'Actual Photo of Business Establishment (Exterior)', ]; const NewPermit = () => { const [step, setStep] = useState(1); const [form, setForm] = useState({ businessType: '', businessName: '', region: '', province: '', city: '', barangay: '', // Step 3 floorArea: '', employeesInArea: '', maleEmployees: '', femaleEmployees: '', vanVehicles: '', truckVehicles: '', motorcycleVehicles: '', nozzleCount: '', weighingScale: '', // Step 4 sameAsBusinessAddress: false, ownPlace: '', lesserName: '', monthlyRental: '', taxIncentives: '', // Step 5 officeType: '', lineOfBusiness: '', products: '', units: '', capitalization: '', // Step 6 requirements: [], businessLineFiles: null, }); const [activities, setActivities] = useState([]); const [activity, setActivity] = useState({ officeType: '', lineOfBusiness: '', products: '', units: '', capitalization: '' }); const [uploadedFiles, setUploadedFiles] = useState([]); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked, files } = e.target; if (type === 'checkbox') { setForm((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: checked })); } else if (type === 'file') { setUploadedFiles(Array.from(files)); } else { setForm((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); } }; const handleRadio = (name, value) => setForm((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); const handleActivityChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setActivity((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const addActivity = () => { setActivities((prev) => [...prev, activity]); setActivity({ officeType: '', lineOfBusiness: '', products: '', units: '', capitalization: '' }); }; const next = () => setStep((s) => s + 1); const prev = () => setStep((s) => s - 1); return (
{/* Step 1: Business Info & Contact */} {step === 1 && (

{activities.length > 0 && (
    {activities.map((act, idx) => (
  • {act.officeType} - {act.lineOfBusiness} - {act.products} - {act.units} units - ₱{act.capitalization}
    • ))}
)}
)} {/* Step 6: Business Requirements */} {step === 6 && (
{ e.preventDefault(); alert('Form submitted!'); }}>
*Business Requirements

(Please upload necessary requirements)

  • {req}

{uploadedFiles.length > 0 && (
    {uploadedFiles.map((file, idx) => (
  • {file.name}
    • ))}
)}
)}
); }; export default NewPermit;
